interactions.response_set_values: self.features['CIRCLE_4'].coordinates[0] = [SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'],  SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon']]; self.features['CIRCLE_5'].coordinates[0] = [SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'],  SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon']]; self.features['CIRCLE_6'].coordinates[0] = [SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'],  SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon']]; self.features['CIRCLE_7'].coordinates[0] = [SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'],  SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon']]
interactions.title: пересчет зон обнаружения/поражения

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_1.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_1.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.title: расчет точки перехвата

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_2.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.title: расчет точки перехвата

Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['lat'], lon1=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['lon'], alt1=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['alt'], speed1=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['speed'], lat2=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lat'], lon2=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['lon'], alt2=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['alt'], speed2=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['speed'], course2=BEK_MIKOLA_2.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BPLA_VT40_2.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BPLA_VT40_2.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BPLA_VT40_2.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))

interactions.title: Прибытие в РОЖ
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['state'] in ['finished'] and BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['target'] == '' and Model_00.actions.object_in_rog(item=BEK_MIKOLA_4, geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="WAITING_REGION")) != ''

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_4.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.title: Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи и вычисление маршрута
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['state'] in ['waiting', 'standing'] and self.iteration_time >=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['waiting_time'] and BEK_MIKOLA_4.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_4, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['detection_distance'])

interactions.title: Цель уничтожена
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['state'] == 'attacking'  and  BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['target'] != '' and BEK_MIKOLA_4.actions.check_destroyed(objects=self.objects,  attacker=BEK_MIKOLA_4, target=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['target'], min_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['distance_of_defeat'], probability=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['probability']) and SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['state'] in ['destroyed']

interactions.response_action: Model_00.actions.fox_rabbit(lat1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lat'], lon1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lon'], alt1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['alt'], speed1=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['speed'], lat2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lat'], lon2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['lon'], alt2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['alt'], speed2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['speed'], course2=SHIP_ROGOV_1.properties['course'], dt=100.0) and BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['geo_path']['geometry']['coordinates'] = BEK_MIKOLA_4.actions.find_path(ship_lat=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lat'], ship_lon=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['lon'], target_lat=Model_00.properties['lat'], target_lon=Model_00.properties['lon'], geo_area=Model_00.actions.filter_by_type(objects=self.features, obj_type="RESTRICTED_AREA"))
interactions.title: Цель обнаружена, расчет точки встречи и вычисление маршрута
interactions.trigger_condition: BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['state'] in ['finished', 'attacking'] and BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['target'] != '' and self.iteration_time % 10 == 0 and BEK_MIKOLA_4.actions.look_detection(item1=BEK_MIKOLA_4, item2=SHIP_ROGOV_1,  rain=WEATHER.properties['rain_intensive'], frog=WEATHER.properties['frog_intensive'], max_distance=BEK_MIKOLA_4.properties['detection_distance'])

properties.name: is_day
properties.title: наличие или отсутствие естественного или искусственного освещения цели
